pr_title: [BEAM-10761] Prefer TestPubsub#assertSubscriptionEventuallyExists when waiting to inject data

timeline.message: Don't check the subscription that was created by TestPubsub

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change *

{@Deprecated prefer {@link #assertSubscriptionEventuallyCreated}}. * * @param project GCP project identifier. * @param timeoutDuration Joda duration that sets a period of time before checking times out. * @param project GCP project identifier. * @param timeoutDuration Joda duration that sets a period of time before checking times out. * @deprecated Use {@link #assertSubscriptionEventuallyCreated}.
timeline.author: lukecwik
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -273,11 +275,30 @@ public PollingAssertion assertThatTopicEventuallyReceives(Matcher /** * Check if topics exist. * + *

{@Deprecated prefer {@link #assertSubscriptionEventuallyCreated}}. + * * @param project GCP project identifier. * @param timeoutDuration Joda duration that sets a period of time before checking times out.
